DOC.brief_summary: the purpose of this study is to investigate the development of insulin resistance in multiple sclerosis patients + explaining the effects of a combined training programme on insulin resistance, muscle power and aerobic capacity in multiple sclerosis patients
DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitation in Multiple Sclerosis: Influence of Exercise on Development of Insulin Resistance, Muscle Power and Aerobic Capacity
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed MS according to the McDonald criteria Expanded Disability Status Scale (EDSS) between 0.5 and 6 Be able to train 5 times in 2 weeks at the University Comorbidities like cardiovascular, respiratory, orthopaedic or metabolic diseases (like diabetes type 2) Having had an relapse in a period of 3 months prior to the start of the intervention period Having an relapse during the intervention period Pregnancy and other contra indications for physical activity Mental disorders
